p: Fenton reaction was used to evaluate the hydroxyl radical scavenging activity ( Amir et al., 2011, Yu et al., 2004). Using a (Shimadzu, UV–Vis) spectrophotometer, the absorbance of the sample mixtures was recorded at 560 nm after 5 m of incubation at room temperature. The scavenging behavior of hydroxyl radicals was measured using Eq. (1).
